targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE time > now() - 10m AND is_wired = 'true' group by channel
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE time > now() - 10m AND is_wired = 'false' group by channel
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 10m AND ap_mac = '80:2a:a8:10:ae:87') group by radio_proto, radio, radio_name, ap_mac
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 10m AND ap_mac = '80:2a:a8:10:ae:0c') group by radio_proto, radio, radio_name, ap_mac
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 60m) group by oui
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE (time > now() - 10m) group by os_class, os_name, dev_cat, dev_family, dev_id

panels.description: Bandwidth usage per wireless devices as reported by the UAPs. Does not include amazon devices.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: UAP Bandwidth / Wireless Devices

panels.description: Cameras TX / RX bytes per second (calculated in 30 second buckets).

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: Switch Bandwidth / Cameras

panels.description: Amazon Devices TX / RX bytes per second (calculated in 30 second buckets).

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: Switch Bandwidth / Echos & FireTVs

panels.description: Wired TX / RX bytes per second (calculated in 30 second buckets). Does not include amazon and camera devices.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.title: Switch Bandwidth / Wired Devices
